pr_title: Fix unit file equipment entry modifier order

timeline.message: Write crit entry modifiers to mtf in reverse order that they are read.
Check for pod-mounted before sponson/pintle turret.
Switch (T) and (R) in mtf back to original order.

timeline.bodyText: Why aren't these else if statements?
timeline.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: Because the whole point of this is that more than one can apply.
replies.author: neoancient

replies.bodyText: No, because the string is modified before the next check.
replies.author: neoancient

timeline.bodyText: Is this ever used or just assigned?
timeline.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: Did you actually look at the rest of the code?
replies.author: neoancient

replies.bodyText:
I did, and saw it assigned and not used.
I did miss that it was a previously existing variable, hence the question.
replies.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: It's used in a part of the code that wasn't modified for this PR. Hence my question about actually looking at the rest of the code.
replies.author: neoancient

replies.bodyText:
I scan read, so I can miss stuff because of it.
However, I always take a look at the rest of the code when reviewing, to try to avoid dumb mistakes like this. My apologies on this one
replies.author: Windchild292
